name: Restaurant X & Bully Boy Bar Reviews

review.title: “Decent place for the money, but tough hours”
review.pros: Pros – Pay is higher than other places aroundStaff is courteous and friendlyIf you ask for time off in advance, you almost always get it
review.cons: Cons – As a new employee you will be working each weekend and usually almost all weekend, so you will have a severely limited social life. The worst is the changeover from Saturday nights to Sunday mornings
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The management does a very good job
